15533222222222222222222222222131.content:
"Flight control, this is Flight 244 from New York to London we have entered a strong storm and navigation data is down, do you copy?" The copilot of the unlucky flight tried in vain to contact flight control. " This is Flight 244, we're flying blind here someone please respond." the woman attempted as she tried to keep the obvious nerves from sounding off through her voice.

They had entered this freak storm... Some time ago, it was difficult to tell if it had been ten minutes, or an hour. The passenger's braced on each buck and whip of the metal hull. This continued until the pilots saw what almost looked like a pond of water suspended and steadily rippling.... And then they passed through it.


Scarlett Johansson let out a soft yawn as she let herself drop onto her couch, it was Sunday her day to be lazy and relax. The later morning sun poured through the windows and danced across the floor of her living room. Mrs. Johansson reached down towards the television remote, gripping it in her well manicured hand before pressing the power button. She smiled in satisfaction as she found something on Netflix to watch, content with enjoying the quiet day.


The plane ripped through the water like entity, shaking violently as the hull suffered critical damage. Two of the engines had burst in plumes of smoke. "We just lost.... Holy...." The flight had somehow appeared right next to the monolithic face of Scarlett Johansson! The crew and passengers for a moment forgot all about their turmoil as they soared past the incredible sight outside...

Reality only set in as the plane continued to descend towards the ground. The pilots had mere moments to aim for their crash landing destination.
